, Canada. It consists of that portion of the former York County directly north of Toronto (excluding the six former boroughs of
itself). This area includes various north-of-Toronto suburbs in telephone area code +1-905.

value: (town) - local government seat of Regional Municipality of York

The main airport serving York Region is Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ), which is located just outside the Region's southwest border, in
. There are two small local airports in southeast York Region, Buttonville Airport (privately-owned, scheduled to close in 2015) and Markham Airport.

Use public transit. YRT operates frequent bus services and VIVA operates rapid transit with comfy buses up and down major thoroughfares in the region. The stops are spread out making for a quick ride. Think of an above-ground subway on wheels!
